growthexperiments-homepage-specialpage-t:
Title for Special:Homepage. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of the current user. Can be used with GENDER.
growthexperiments-homepage-specialpage-s:
Subtitle for Special:Homepage. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of the current user. Can be used with GENDER.
prefs-homepage: Text of the section header for the "Newcomer homepage" preference section.
growthexperiments-homepage-enable: Text of the preference to display the homepage tab along with user and talk.
growthexperiments-homepage-pt-link: Text of the preference to make the username link in the personal tools go to the homepage instead of the userpage.
growthexperiments-homepage-impact-header:
Title of the newcomer homepage Impact module.
* $1 - Name of the current user. Can be used with GENDER.
growthexperiments-homepage-impact-subhea:
Subtitle of the newcomer homepage Impact module.
* $1 - Name of the current user. Can be used with GENDER.
growthexperiments-homepage-impact-contri:
Text of the link to Special::Contributions.
* $1 - Edit count of the current user.
* $2 - Name of the current user. Can be used with GENDER.
growthexperiments-homepage-impact-subhea:
Subtitle of the newcomer homepage Impact module when the user has not edited any article yet.
* $1 - Name of the current user. Can be used with GENDER.
growthexperiments-homepage-impact-body-n:
Text in the center of the widget when the use has not edited any article yet.
* $1 - Name of the current user. Can be used with GENDER.
growthexperiments-homepage-impact-contri:
Text of the link to Special::Contributions when the use has not edited any article yet.
* $1 - Edit count of the current user.
* $2 - Name of the current user. Can be used with GENDER.
growthexperiments-homepage-impact-articl: Tooltip of the link to go to the article
growthexperiments-homepage-impact-pagevi: Tooltip of the link to go to the pageviews analysis tool
growthexperiments-homepage-help-ask-help: Text to show in button for asking a question to the help desk.
tag-help_module_question: Short change tag name for edits made by the post a question feature in the help module.
tag-help_module_question-description: Short change tag description for edits made by the post a question feature in the help module.
growthexperiments-homepage-help-header: Text to show in the subheader of the help module
growthexperiments-homepage-help-subheade: Text to show in the subheader of the help module
growthexperiments-homepage-help-cancel: Text shown on a button to close the help panel.
